Nana is not the best at writing her recipe's down but she did write this one up for me.

- 1 cup flour
- 1 tablespoon white sugar
- 1/4 teaspoon salt

- 2 large eggs
- 1 cup of milk
- 1+ teasppon of vanilla\
  (use pancake syrup if you can't find vanilla -- then cut back on sugar)
- 2 teaspoons of oil
- Sugar, forgarnish

(Fry in a well heated and generously oiled pan)
